hero.title: TECHNICAL ANALYST / DEVELOPER
hero.subtitle: Bridging Business Needs with Technical Solutions
hero.description: Enthusiastic and detail-oriented professional with 5+ years of experience in software development, data analysis, and creating scalable digital solutions. Passionate about using technology to solve real-world problems.

paragraphs: I am a versatile team player and independent contributor with a strong background as a Technical Analyst & Developer. I possess acute attention to detail, critical reasoning skills, and a knack for problem-solving.

With over 5 years of experience, I have worked on building scalable web applications, optimizing databases, and developing robust solutions as an Technical Analyst/Developer. My expertise spans Frontend Development (React, Next.js), Snowflake, AWS, and automated testing frameworks.
Currently working as a Full-time Programmer/Analyst at Okanagan College and part-time Data Contractor at Alloy.ai

languages.name: languages.json

frameworks.name: frameworks.yaml
frameworks.content:
# Frontend Development
frontend:
  core:
    - name: React.js
      version: 18.x
      features: [Hooks, Context API]
    - name: Next.js
      type: SSR/SSG framework
    - Vue.js
    - Bootstrap
    - jQuery
  languages:
    - HTML5
    - CSS3 (Sass)
    - JavaScript
  tools:
    - AJAX
    - Figma (Web Designing)

# Backend & API
backend:
  runtime: Node.js (v16+)
  frameworks:
    - Express.js
    - Fastify
  database_orm:
    - Prisma
    - Mongoose

# Data Engineering
data_stack:
  processing: [Pandas, NumPy, Spark]
  orchestration: [Airflow, Prefect]
  warehousing: [Snowflake, Redshift]

infrastructure.name: infrastructure.sh
infrastructure.content:
#!/bin/bash

echo "Initializing system health check..."
sleep 0.5

# Cloud Infrastructure
check_service "AWS Cloud" "us-east-1" "Active"
check_service "Snowflake Data Cloud" "Enterprise" "Connected"

# Containerization
check_container "Docker Engine" "v24.0.2" "Running"
check_container "Kubernetes Cluster" "v1.27" "Healthy"

# CI/CD Pipelines
check_pipeline "GitHub Actions" "Build & Test" "Passing"
check_pipeline "Terraform State" "Remote Backend" "Locked"

echo "----------------------------------------"
echo "System Status: ALL SYSTEMS OPERATIONAL"
echo "Ready for deployment."

experience.title: Data Contractor
experience.description: Utilizing Snowflake Cloud Data Platform to extract, transform, and prepare Walmart data for reporting. Automated tasks using Python and Bash scripts. Writing complex SQL queries and adapting to technologies like SAP Analytics Cloud.

experience.title: Programmer/Analyst
experience.description: Creating enterprise web platforms tailored to client requirements using HTML5, PHP, CSS3, SASS, MySQL, Git, Twig, JavaScript, AWS, Lando, Docker, Kubernetes, and Drupal. Proficient in AI driven solutions and architecture. Conducting thorough testing and QA. Mentoring teams and collaborating with clients to resolve issues and delivering timely solutions.

experience.title: Analyst/Developer
experience.description: Partnered with stakeholders to document needs and analyze data for business insights. Managed end-to-end development projects using Agile workflows and delivered high-quality, scalable code.

experience.title: Front-end Developer
experience.description: Designed and implemented web templates using React, Next.js, and Drupal. Optimized assets and wrote integration tests with Cypress. Contributed to responsive and accessible design solutions.

experience.title: Developer
experience.description: Built functional elements using React.js, Twig, and Drupal. Conducted QA and utilized GitFlow for code integration. Managed Google Tag Manager implementations.

experience.title: PHP Developer
experience.description: Developed customized web applications using CodeIgniter and PHP. Collaborated with cross-functional teams and implemented security best practices.

certifications.title: Networks and Network Security
certifications.description: Connect and Protect: Advanced network security protocols

certifications.title: Manage Security Risks
certifications.description: Play It Safe: Security risk management and mitigation

certifications.title: Advanced JavaScript
certifications.description: Modern ES6+ features and async programming

projects.title: Snowflake ETL Pipeline (Production)
projects.description: Production ETL system processing retail data using Snowflake Cloud Platform. Wrote complex SQL queries for data transformation, validation, and multi-department reporting with 99.9% accuracy.

projects.title: Automated Testing Framework for Data Pipelines
projects.description: Built comprehensive test automation suite using Selenium, Cypress, and Playwright. Ensures data integrity across web applications and APIs with 95% code coverage.

projects.title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Full-stack analytics platform using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. Visualizes business metrics in real-time with optimized database queries reducing load time by 60%.

projects.title: Cloud Migration & Data Warehouse Optimization
projects.description: Migrated legacy MySQL databases to AWS cloud infrastructure. Implemented Docker containerization and optimized queries, reducing operational costs by 35%.

projects.title: REST API Integration Hub
projects.description: Enterprise API integration platform connecting 12+ third-party services including payment processors, shipping providers, and CRM systems. Features intelligent rate limiting, caching, and handles 1M+ daily API calls with 99.9% uptime.

projects.title: GraphQL API Gateway
projects.description: Unified GraphQL gateway aggregating 8 microservices using Apollo Federation. Implements DataLoader batching reducing database queries by 80%, with type-safe schema stitching and real-time subscriptions.

projects.title: Microservices API Orchestration
projects.description: Event-driven architecture orchestrating 15+ microservices with saga patterns for distributed transactions. Implements RabbitMQ, Kafka messaging, circuit breakers, and distributed tracing with Jaeger processing 500K+ events daily.

projects.title: API Security Gateway
projects.description: Enterprise security platform with OAuth2, JWT authentication, multi-tier rate limiting, and DDoS protection. Features WAF rules, ML-based anomaly detection, and processes 2M+ requests daily while blocking 50K+ threats.

contact.description: Currently open for new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to discuss architectures, my inbox is open.
